feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:19 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WNW 49 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
